posts.description: Pando on Twitter: "Awkward! "Corporate personhood" relies on the same Amendment that gives birthright citizenship  https://t.co/pzssOt5wqR via @pandodaily"
posts.extended: And this is why I follow Pando. Making connections that I don't see anywhere else.
RT @JamesDeen: remember last week when i registered a complaint with the press.
